attributes.title: Box Rules & Bankrolls
attributes.caption: The board is set, the players are ready, and $20,580 is on the line as six members of Achievement Hunter begin the most intense Monopoly game of their lives.
attributes.description: The board is set, the players are ready, and $20,580 is on the line as six members of Achievement Hunter begin the most intense Monopoly game of their lives.

attributes.title: The Properties are Lava
attributes.caption: While half the table attempts to build empires, the other half seems to face trouble at every turn.
attributes.description: While half the table attempts to build empires, the other half seems to face trouble at every turn.

attributes.title: Roll with Caution
attributes.caption: Properties become scarce, alliances form, and one player puts the jail and Bailiff Jones to the test.
attributes.description: Properties become scarce, alliances form, and one player puts the jail and Bailiff Jones to the test.

attributes.title: The Player Killer
attributes.caption: With powerful monopolies in play, a player-killing deal threatens to eliminate any player that ventures to the wrong part of the board.
attributes.description: With powerful monopolies in play, a player-killing deal threatens to eliminate any player that ventures to the wrong part of the board.

attributes.title: Allies & Auctions
attributes.caption: With one player eliminated, the pressure is on to survive an increasingly dangerous board.
attributes.description: With one player eliminated, the pressure is on to survive an increasingly dangerous board.

attributes.title: The Turn
attributes.caption: The remaining players set their sights on the safety of jail, hoping to avoid expensive property landmines at every turn.
attributes.description: The remaining players set their sights on the safety of jail, hoping to avoid expensive property landmines at every turn.

attributes.title: Luck's Pendulum
attributes.caption: Luck shifts wildly between the players, with unexpected rolls proving disastrous for some, and lucrative for others.
attributes.description: Luck shifts wildly between the players, with unexpected rolls proving disastrous for some, and lucrative for others.

attributes.title: The Power of 7
attributes.caption: The final two competitors stage an all out battle for bragging rights and cash -- who will emerge as the victor of Hardcore Tabletop?
attributes.description: The final two competitors stage an all out battle for bragging rights and cash -- who will emerge as the victor of Hardcore Tabletop?
